```{r , load packages, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(pander)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(stringr)
library(caret)
```


```{r,read in the datasets, include=FALSE}
pml_testing= read_csv("pml-testing.csv")

pml_training= read_csv("pml-training.csv")
```

```{r partition the training data into validation and training set, include=YES}
intrain= createDataPartition(y=pml_training$classe,p=0.75,list = F)

pml_trainingset=pml_training[intrain,]

pml_validating=pml_training[-intrain,]
```
```{r, training the models using random forest}
modelFR= train(classe ~ data=pml_trainingset,method= 'rf')
```
